alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:00PM CDT until June 10 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN STONE...SOUTHWESTERN INDEPENDENCE AND NORTHEASTERN CLEBURNE COUNTIES... At 1259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Concord, or 13 miles northeast of Heber Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Pleasant Plains... Concord... Bethesda... Ben... Almond... Drasco... Hutchinson... Wolf Bayou... Desha... Ida... Locust Grove... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
